channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bank Runs and Liquidity Crises: Insights from the Diamond-Dybvig Model
item.description: This blog explores the mechanics of bank runs -- why they happen even in the absence of fundamental financial distress, and how central banks can inte...

item.title: North Dakota Sen. Kevin Cramer is recovering from head injuries after slipping on ice
item.description: U.S. Sen. Kevin Cramer of North Dakota is recovering at his Bismarck home after injuring his head over the weekend when he slipped on ice.

item.title: The Great Energy Divide Is About Beliefs, Not Principles
item.description: Fossil fuel opponents have based their policies on the hope that ‘green’ energy will someday become reliable and affordable.

item.title: GOP lawmakers push Trump to recognize West Bank as Israeli territory
item.description: Republicans sent a letter to President Donald Trump urging him to change U.S. policy and recognize the West Bank as Israeli territory

item.title: White House pushes back on report claiming some canceled DOGE contracts won't save taxpayers money
item.description: The Associated Press assessed that nearly 40% of the contracts canceled by the Trump administration won't save the government money.

item.description: Thefts have occurred in Arizona and California over the past year.

item.title: NYT Blasts Dr. Oz’s Financial Disclosure, While Jennifer Granholm’s Near-Identical One Escaped Scrutiny
item.description: Dr. Mehmet Oz's financial disclosure is nearly identical to the document filed by former Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm.

item.title: IVF Won’t MAGA

item.title: The top 10 car picks for 2025, as selected by Consumer Reports
item.description: Six of them are hybrids—and there’s one EV.

item.title: Elon Musk says federal workers have one more chance to list their accomplishments via email: ‘Failure to respond a second time will result in termination’
item.description: "The email request was utterly trivial, as the standard for passing the test was to type some words and press send!" Musk said.

item.title: Republicans Should Fight ‘Resistance’ Democrats’ Nationwide Injunctions
item.description: Congress should restrict use of nationwide injunctions and make it more difficult to rig results by judge shopping in such cases.

item.description: Billionaires like Tim Cook are raving about the book, which reframes wealth to include social, time, mental, and physical prosperity.
